scripts.build: yarn run lint && echo Using TypeScript && tsc --version && tsc --pretty -p .
scripts.build:docker: yarn run build && docker build -t <%= orgname %>/<%= appname %>:latest . && docker push <%= orgname %>/<%= appname %>:latest
scripts.watch:test: nodemon -w test -w src --exec yarn run test
scripts.yarn:install:mongoose: yarn add bluebird mongoose && yarn add -D @types/bluebird @types/mongodb @types/mongoose && echo 'take a look in the README to see how to get started'
scripts.yarn:install:graphql: yarn add graphql-server-express body-parser express graphql graphql-tools && yarn add -D @types/body-parser && echo 'take a look in the README to see how to get started'
